verses.name: Proverbs 10:12
verses.text: Hatred stirreth up strifes: but love covereth all sins.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:13
verses.text: In the lips of him that hath understanding wisdom is found: but a rod is for the back of him that is void of understanding.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:14
verses.text: Wise men lay up knowledge: but the mouth of the foolish is near destruction.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:15
verses.text: The rich man’s wealth is his strong city: the destruction of the poor is their poverty.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:16
verses.text: The labour of the righteous tendeth to life: the fruit of the wicked to sin.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:17
verses.text: He is in the way of life that keepeth instruction: but he that refuseth reproof erreth.
